experience.title: Assistant Engineer
experience.description: - Part of the team working on implementing DDR5 Behavioral Model (BM) and was able to complete formal verification of some sub-modules of DDR5.- Worked on implementation of BCH Error Correction Code (ECC) and was able to present a complete C++ model for that which included completed Encoding and Decoding.- Developed an asynchronous First in First Out (FIFO) device in System Verilog and wrote assertions for the same for its functional verification and verified it by creating a test-bench.
experience.description_html: - Part of the team working on implementing DDR5 Behavioral Model (BM) and was able to complete formal verification of some sub-modules of DDR5.- Worked on implementation of BCH Error Correction Code (ECC) and was able to present a complete C++ model for that which included completed Encoding and Decoding.- Developed an asynchronous First in First Out (FIFO) device in System Verilog and wrote assertions for the same for its functional verification and verified it by creating a test-bench.
